guide.title: Gentoo Linux Installer Roadmap
guide.abstract: A roadmap to the 1.0 release of the Gentoo Linux Installer

body.p: This is a roadmap to the 1.0 release of the Gentoo Linux Installer which will constantly be updated to reflect the current issues and future milestones in order to serve as a TODO list for the project.

ul.li: Support for non-initrd kernels in genkernel.
Set down core installer requirements for the release LiveCDs.
Discuss with releng if the core installer requirements can be met by the release LiveCDs otherwise we will need a custom LiveCD.
Discuss with releng what UI support we might be able to look forward to in the future (X, gtk, qt, etc).
Get a subproject link from the releng project page.
